bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of slackening and loss of strength resulting from a bi bing 痹病 , 痹病 , blockage disease. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bi jie 萆薢 quoting Zhen yuan guang li fang 貞元廣利方 : 療丈夫腰脚痹，緩急，行履 不穩者 , “It heals males experiencing blockages affecting the lumbar region and legs, with alternating episodes of slackening and tension, so that they are unable to walk steadily”, writes: 腰脚痹軟，行履不穩者 , “Lumbar region and legs experience blockage with slackening ; patients are unable to walk steadily”.
